# Benchmark a few producer-consumer queues (pcQueue)

## Dependency

```
apt install libxenium-dev
apt install libreaderwriterqueue-dev
```

## Results

```
CPU Model: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5-1620 v4 @ 3.50GHz
```
